page.title: 08CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: Here are some of the games that we play at{Symondsbury School: {Bar Touch {Bar Touch}is a game that you can play on bars. There is someone "on" and they have to count to ten and then they have to come and touch you. If they do manage to touch you then you are on. { Wood Touch {Wood Touch}is a game where someone is "on" and if you are not on wood they can touch you. If they do touch you, you are then "on" and then you have to touch someone else. Wood is the place where they can not touch you.
